article: president bush is offering taiwan a variety of military equipment , including submarines , to face off a chinese threat , while deferring sales of the item taiwan wants most : high-tech u.s. destroyers equipped with the aegis combat radar system .
abstract: bush wo n't sell aegis to taiwan
candidates: taiwan wants high-tech destroyers equipped with the aegis combat radar system.
